entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for April 05, 2024

summary.caption: “So … you must be the one they call Mr. Long.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for April 05, 2024

summary.caption: And then, just as he predicted, Thag became the spiritual channeler for a two-million-year-old gibbon named Gus.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for April 05, 2024

summary.caption: “Boy, everyone’s really out wandering the streets tonight. … I tell you, Charles, we’re getting to be real home zombies.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for April 05, 2024

summary.caption:
“Bootsy! … Booooooootsy! … We are calling you 
from the world of the living! … Meowwww! … Are you there, Bootsy? … Give us a sign!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for April 05, 2024

summary.caption: “Hey! I think I’m getting Orange Crush over here.”
